phrases: I do not like you, Izumo.
We shall not follow you, woman!
Do not tell anyone that I cried yesterday.
Just promise me you will not tell anyone!
Oh shut up, I said I am not telling anyone.
If you had not been there, who knows what would have happened to Paku and I...
You are a nice person after all!
I washed it because it was dirty.
In two or three days the fever will go down and you can get up again.
Thank you very much, Mr. Okumura.
We are investigating how it got in and where it went right now.
It was a higher level Naberius.
Did not you say that the Academy is protected by barriers and charms?
That is right, I am really impressed you remembered.
Are you making fun of me again?
That is true, but every now and then such beasts can sneak in.
We have to brace ourselves just in case.
What is this all of a sudden?!
It is hard to believe that they are really twins.
If only I had been nicer...
It is just that this exorcism thing is not my world.
So do not look like that.
I love you the way you are.
This is the order of a certain person...
At first I thought it was Satan,
but I cannot think of any reason why he would try to get me killed now.
There will be those who will come to hunt you down.
If they are targeting me anyway, why not attack me head on?
Do not just pop up like that!
You too, do not just sit up like that, stupid!
It is okay, I can do it alone.
But why are you doing laundry?
Because I want to be of some use, too...
With stuff only I could do.
You are all working hard to become Exorcists and help people, right?
So you do not want to become an Exorcist?
But first let me just do my specialty, laundry.
Most of ze demonz'ave a so called le fatal verse, words or quotes zat will make zem le die instantly.
Aria specializez in le memorization and le recital of zose fatal verses.
Zen let us'ear you recitez what I gave youze for'omework.
Continuez from where we were le last time.
Oh, now zat is unusual for you, Mademoiselle Kamiki.
And we praise Thy Name forever, yea, forever and ever.
O Lord, deign to keep us from sin this day.
Have mercy on us, O Lord, have mercy on us.
Let Thy mercy, O Lord, be upon us, for we have hoped in Thee.
O Lord, in Thee I have hoped; let me never be put to shame.
Be careful not to fall for me now...
You are really smart after all!
More than being smart, Bon's just good at memorizing.
Konekomaru, that means I am smart, right?
Memorizing is not that great a skill.
I do not want to hear that from someone who cannot even remember four lines!
It is not that I cannot, I just chose not to remember!
Aria are totally defenseless while chanting, so they need to be protected by their team.
We are aiming for Aria, you know!
If you want to hit me, go on!
Do not laugh at people's dreams!
Ah, that you will defeat Satan?
Are you telling me not to laugh at such a joke?
Why do you want to become an Exorcist?
I have never told anyone why I want to become one.
If you want to fight, do it somewhere else!
It is a low level demon, too.
It gets heavier... while you hold it.
You do not even know about Ghost Stones?
It is because you had to pick a fight...
There is another purpose to this camp besides studying,
and that is strengthening your bonds with each other.
I do not want to have any bonds with these people!
You have to get along with each other!
Support each other's abilities and cover the weaknesses.
Everyone fights in teams of at least two!
In actual battles, a quarrel in the team can lead to death!
Now I will be gone for three hours on a mission.
Due to the incident with the Ghoul yesterday,
I will lock every entrance to the dormitory
and put up strong barriers around it.
Then how can we get out?
There is no need for you to go out.
In the three hours that I will be gone,
you will get on well and cool your heads.
Three hours... he is the demon here!
He is a really nice guy.
We are in this nice situation because of a certain someone.
Says the one who grabbed me by the collar.
And who started the fight to begin with?
Do not fight with me in the middle!
You really are an annoying woman!
You will just scare everyone away like that!
The stone fell on my foot!
Did he turn the lights off, too?
Is this building the only one without power?
Heh, events like this always make me excited.
I guess I have not slept enough.
It is the Ghoul from yesterday!
Did not he put up barriers?
It is lively for a corpse!
The Ghouls get really active when it is dark.
It is because of the Ghoul's miasma.
Damn, Yukio, where did you go?
If Moriyama's strength runs out, the barricade will be gone.
Then we will be done for.
He is not picking up his phone.
I will go out and lure it away.
If it follows me, you guys run away.
Do not worry about me, I am stronger than I look.
You are after me, are not you?
Anyway, let us just get out of here.
Moriyama, you can lower the barricade.
If I turn on the lights, the Ghoul will get weaker.
I cannot just sit and wait until it gets through.
Let us kill it with chants.
Bon, that is fine but do you know its fatal verse?
I do not, but Ghoul type demons usually have their fatal verses from the Gospel of John.
I memorized all of it already, so if I just recite it, I will hit the right one somewhere.
Sure, let us do this, Konekomaru.
If you start chanting, it will go and attack you!
A girl is protecting us all alone!
A guy cannot just sit back and wait!
Bon, you are the real man.
I have not memorized any of it.
Oh, you had that with you?
If it gets through, I will help you.
You had such a big mouth earlier,
but now that things get real you wet yourself!
Stand back if you are not going to fight!
Konekomaru, you do it from the first chapter, I will start from the 11th.
Do not let it get through.
Now a certain man was sick...
In the beginning was the Word...
That is it, those flames are what I wanted to see.
Looks like you cannot use your powers in front of others,
so I took the liberty of inviting you here, Okumura Rin.
Let not your heart be troubled: ye believe in God, believe also in me.
I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.
Bon has almost reached the end!
And when he had spoken this, he saith unto him,'Follow me.'
How can you know about that?
Was yesterday's incident your doing, too?
You will not get away with this!
Today... you were not your usual self.
Why is she worried about me?
I was not my usual self.
I humbly call upon the Gods of Harvest.
Follow my wishes, leave none unfulfilled!
Woman, how dare you summon us again?
Then went this saying abroad among the brethren, that that disciple should not die...
I am a bad person, but I am also a sore loser.
Tremble as a leaf, tremble I say!
But that is who I am!
Fall... and never return to life!
and we know that his testimony is true.
I suppose that even the world...
I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written!
What the hell's wrong with you?!
Wait, do you want to kill me?
I love you the way you are!
What is the meaning of this?
It was all to understand Rin Okumura's powers as much as possible.
Episode 8 szia Now a Certain Man was Sick
sei wo uke sorezore ga jinsei wo ouka
nou no black box wo shiru sore wa kou ka
you wa limit line wo subete ryouga
saa ikou ka fumidasu sore wa kyou da
yappa hibi wa ika sen kou sotsunaku konashitecha no no
stop nagare wo mikiwamena mazu mono to mo sezu ikou ze (here we go)
todokanu mono ya kagiri aru mono ni
atsuku naru mune wo osaetsukeru no wa
rikai mo sezu osaetsukeyou to shitekita
ano otonatachi to onaji jan ka yo
mune wo moyasu hi wa dare ni mo keseya shinai
sora kara furu kuroi ame ga kono mi nurashi furitomanakutomo
mada ore wa kawareru jibun de kaetemiseru
kore ga sou pride sorezore no basho de
mada mada kieru na kokoro no hi wo
mada mada ikeru zo ikeru zo
After birth, people live as they wish
They then learn the black box in their head; is that bliss?
Just cross over, beyond the line of your limit
Let us go, take a step, and I mean this minute
Life's a bitch, so if it is easy, you are doing it wrong
Stop, which way is the world going?
Then ignore it and go wherever (here we go)
There are things I could never have, things with time
Is there a reason I force my heart upon them?
I never tried to understand, I just forced it on them
I am no better than those lifeless adults
Even if it is just a pipe dream I could never have
But no one can put out the fire in my heart
The black rain may pour hard and leave me drenched
But I know I can change, I will change myself
This is my pride, what makes up my core
I will not let my fire be put out; not yet
I will keep going, and I will never stop
(Please be) Dakara moshi kono mune ga
(With me) Michi ni mayou hi ni wa
Mirai e no tobira wo hiraite hoshii
This is what they call fate.
the way we keep on shining together.
Let us keep our gazes locked
so it will not fade away.
(Please be) Maybe the day will come
(With me) that we will lose our way
while looking for the door to the future.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off
So do not let go of my hand.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
